name: alkene
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any gas in a group that contains carbon and hydrogen atoms, with the carbon atoms joined together in a double bond: Ethene and propene are alkenes.

chemistry any of a group of substances that contain only the elements carbon and hydrogen, which are held together by a chemical bond in which two atoms share two pairs of electrons
